Description:
------------
* Capture videos and photos from camcorders, digital cameras, phones, DVDs, etc.

Edit

* Edit HD video on your computer with an ultra-fast response when using AVCHD and H.264-based
* Organize the media resources and project bin folders of favorites
* Montage included templates give you a push to start with multi animations, transitions and titles easy to apply
* Back up your work with the new archiving and retrieval tool *

Improvement

* Use Motion Titler to create sophisticated animated titles with drag and drop
* Add professional effects to the award winning visual effects company Red Giant
* Add an incredible Dolby Digital 5.1 surround sound to your productions
* The green background for chroma key of 152 ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬â€ 183 cm to modify the scenarios and locations of items
* Use stop-motion capture for animation and amazing fast-motion effects
* Stabilizes shaky camera shots with the same technology used in Avid major film productions
* Use DVD menus included to achieve a professional look

Share

* Upload files to YouTube with one click, including widescreen formats (high quality) and HD *
* Share directly to Blu-ray and DVD
* Export to Flash movies, DivX * Plus MKV, QuickTime Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® HD *, AVCHD, AVCHD Lite *, PS3, Wii, Xbox Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and more


* New in Version 15.
Included Content
Plug-ins Bundle Red Giant Professionals

* With the bundled plug-ins from Red Giant can improve your production with the same visual effects used in Hollywood blockbusters:
* Knoll Light Factory: flashing light effects and effects master John Knoll (visual effects supervisor for Star Wars, Pirates of the Caribbean, Avatar ...)
* ToonIt: convert video to animation
* Trapcode Shine: effects of light rays
* Private: 3D effects of smoke, explosion and rain
* Magic Bullet Looks: change the look and tone of the film
* Trapcode 3D Stroke: 3D animation and effects


Hollywood FX Vols. 1-3

* More than 1,000 unique transitions and effects professional level, with topics such as Waves, Sports, Space, Sci-Fi, Holiday, Weddings, Comics and Cartoons, Pirates, Secret Agents, Tropical Vacation, Historical Architecture and many more. It also includes the HFX Editor to create custom effects.

Creative Pack Volume 1

DVD menus * 32, 91 and 28 degrees Montage templates, including: Leafy Greens Trees and Cool, Floral and Botanical, Hawaii, 50's Modern, Islands, Red Retro and many more.

Installation Instructions:
- Run the file welcome.exe, which is in the root directory, you will see this window:

- Install in this order from the window options:
1 - 9 VCM codec Install wmc
2 - Install Pinnacle Systems Keys
3 - Install Pinnacle Studio 15 Ultimate Colection Full HD.


After clicking on this last step will install the program and content plus, just press accept all
